mission_data.mission_description: A strange object has been spotted arriving to Xaria sector. It does not respond to long range hails. TSN Artemis must investigate. Seven successful endings possible (Martyr, Mad Scientist, Leader, Warrior, Calculating, Champion, and Guardian). ^^Mission for Light Cruiser with Shuttle. Difficulty set by mission.

set_ship_text.name: Insight
set_ship_text.desc: An unarmed, long-range exploration ship. The hull is an Arvonian design.

warning_popup_message.message: We did it! We released the black hole. Retreat!
warning_popup_message.name: Artemis

event.name: Initial Message 1
event.incoming_comms_text: Welcome to the Xaria sector, Artemis. This is Commander Sofaer. Feel free to dock if you need energy. When you're ready we'd like you to help us calibrate our sensors.

warning_popup_message.message: It looks like DS1 Rampart has a good defensive mine formation here.

event.name: Initial Message 2
event.incoming_comms_text: We had a sensor glitch show up a few minutes ago. It's showing up as an asteroid or small moon, but with a ship's energy signature. It's not responding to long-range hails. Maybe it's a radioactive asteroid?

Unfortunately, the Hegemony bases are jamming long-range scanners so yours probably aren't picking it up at this long range, at least not reliably. Please get closer, but stay out of visual range of the Hegemony ships.

warning_popup_message.message: Doing more advanced scans may require you to tune systems to precise energy levels to detect greater detail.

event.name: Initial Message 3
event.incoming_comms_text: Please note that there are several Hegemony bases on the other side of the asteroid belt. We've had a stand-off for a while, but they've been amassing ships lately. I fear an invasion in imminent, but the brass hasn't sent any of the destroyers we requested.
Honestly, we were hoping they'd send a dreadnought, or at least a battleship. But we're happy to have you joining us.

warning_popup_message.message: There are several enemy commands in the area. Working with Science you can probably determine their comm frequencies for direct communication.

event.name: Initial Message 4
event.incoming_comms_text: While we don't want to touch off a conflict with the Hegemony, especially when we're outgunned, if you see an opportunity to weaken them please take it.

warning_popup_message.message: To deeply investigate some things you may need to scan them three or more times.

event.name: Initial Message 5
event.incoming_comms_text: Please get close enough to examine this sensor glitch, but don't spark off a war. Our escort ships are dedicated and experienced, but there's only two of them.

warning_popup_message.message: When navigating dense asteroids, it can be helpful to look out the front window.

event.name: Initial Message 6
event.incoming_comms_text: We've tried communicating with the Hegemony bases, but they shut down our hailing frequency for any message longer than "Surrender!". I don't think they're motivated to talk to us.

warning_popup_message.message: We can scan special StationScan nodes to get more information about the base.

set_ship_text.name: Armor Shell
set_ship_text.desc: This armored shell protects an inner reactor.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: It's shields regenerate at an increased rate.

set_ship_text.name: Strange Ship
set_ship_text.desc: Strange alien ship with bulbous protrusions on its hull.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Several of the protrusions seem to be turrets.

set_ship_text.name: Turret 1
set_ship_text.desc: This turret has a rapid-fire beam on it.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: It also has a drone launcher.

set_ship_text.name: Turret 2
set_ship_text.desc: This turret has twin beams on it.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: It also has a point defense system to shoot down torpedoes and mines.

set_ship_text.name: Turret 3
set_ship_text.desc: This turret has a rapid-fire beam on it.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: It also has a tractor beam.

set_ship_text.name: Turret 4
set_ship_text.desc: This turret has twin beams on it.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: It also has a point defense system to shoot down torpedoes and mines.

set_ship_text.name: Turret 5
set_ship_text.desc: This turret has a rapid-fire beam on it.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: It also has a drone launcher.

set_ship_text.name: Turret 6
set_ship_text.desc: This turret has a rapid-fire beam on it.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: It also is a shield generator for the ship.

set_ship_text.name: Turret 7
set_ship_text.desc: This turret has a rapid-fire beam on it.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: It also has a drone launcher.

set_ship_text.name: Turret 8
set_ship_text.desc: This turret has twin beams on it.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: It also has a point defense system to shoot down torpedoes and mines.

set_ship_text.name: Turret 9
set_ship_text.desc: This turret has a rapid-fire beam on it.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: It also has a tractor beam.

set_ship_text.name: Turret 10
set_ship_text.desc: This turret has twin beams on it.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: It also has a point defense system to shoot down torpedoes and mines.

set_ship_text.name: Turret 11
set_ship_text.desc: This turret has a rapid-fire beam on it.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: It also has a drone launcher.

event.name: Reset surrendered ship
event.incoming_comms_text: Our communications don't seem to be compatible with this ship! We can't get them to surrender.

set_ship_text.name: Strange Ship
set_ship_text.desc: Strange alien ship with bulbous protrusions on its hull.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Several of the protrusions seem to be turrets.

set_ship_text.name: Turret 1
set_ship_text.desc: This turret has a strong beam on it.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: It also has an anti-torpedo point defense system.

set_ship_text.name: Turret 2
set_ship_text.desc: This turret has a strong beam on it.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: It also has a drone launcher.

set_ship_text.name: Turret 3
set_ship_text.desc: This turret has a strong beam on it.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: It also has a tractor beam.

set_ship_text.name: Turret 4
set_ship_text.desc: This turret has a strong beam on it.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: It also has an anti-mine point defense system.

set_ship_text.name: Turret 5
set_ship_text.desc: This turret has a strong beam on it.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: It also has a drone launcher.

set_ship_text.name: Turret 6
set_ship_text.desc: This turret has a strong beam on it.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: It also has a shield draining system.

set_ship_text.name: Armor Shell
set_ship_text.desc: This armored shell protects an inner reactor.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: It's shields regenerate at an increased rate.

set_ship_text.desc: Strange alien ship with bulbous protrusions on its hull.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Several of the protrusions seem to be turrets.

set_ship_text.name: Turret 1
set_ship_text.desc: This turret has a rapid-fire beam on it.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: It also has an anti-torpedo point defense system.

set_ship_text.name: Turret 2
set_ship_text.desc: This turret has a rapid-fire beam on it.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: It also has a drone launcher.

set_ship_text.name: Turret 3
set_ship_text.desc: This turret has a rapid-fire beam on it.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: It also has a tractor beam.

set_ship_text.name: Turret 4
set_ship_text.desc: This turret has a rapid-fire beam on it.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: It also has a drone launcher.

set_ship_text.name: Turret 5
set_ship_text.desc: This turret has a rapid-fire beam on it.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: It also has an anti-mine point defense.

set_ship_text.name: Turret 6
set_ship_text.desc: This turret has a rapid-fire beam on it.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: It also has a drone launcher.

set_ship_text.name: Strange Ship
set_ship_text.desc: Strange alien ship with bulbous protrusions on its hull.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Several of the protrusions seem to be turrets.

set_ship_text.name: Turret 1
set_ship_text.desc: This turret has 2 rapid-fire beams on it.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: It also has a point defense system.

set_ship_text.name: Turret 2
set_ship_text.desc: This turret has 2 light beams on it.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: It also has a point defense system.

set_ship_text.name: Turret 3
set_ship_text.desc: This turret has 2 light beams on it.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: It also has a point defense system.

set_ship_text.name: Turret 4
set_ship_text.desc: This turret has 2 light beams on it.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: It also has a point defense system.

event.name: KB1 Destroyed
event.incoming_comms_text: What happened? Did that asteroid hit the Kralien station? The station is not showing up on our sensors any more.

warning_popup_message.message: We can scan special StationScan nodes to get more information about the base.

event.name: KB1 Followup Message
event.incoming_comms_text: That's no moon! We tried hailing it again, but it's not responding. Maybe there's something in the debris field of the old station that will tell us what's going on?

set_ship_text.name: Insight
set_ship_text.hailtext: We'll try to observe this strange alien vessel.

event.name: KB2 Destroyed
event.incoming_comms_text: This is fantastic! What ever that thing is is taking care of our Hegemony problem.

event.name: KB2 Followup Message
event.incoming_comms_text: We can use this to our advantage. Change of plans: instead of avoiding the Hegemony bases, try to weaken the remaining stations before that thing gets to them. Then fly away before it gets there. We'll take this border with a little help.

event.name: TB1 Destroyed
event.incoming_comms_text: Wow, did you see what it did to that Torgoth Station? It's truly powerful.

event.name: TB1 Followup Message
event.incoming_comms_text: Excellent! Let's see what it does to the Skaraans.

event.name: SB1 Destroyed
event.incoming_comms_text: Wow! The Skaraan base is down. Do you think you can take out some of those Arvonian fighters before it gets there?

event.name: SB1 Followup Message
event.incoming_comms_text: I guess the Skaraans technology isn't the most advanced after all, eh?

event.name: AB1 Destroyed
event.incoming_comms_text: It sure took that Arvonian station apart quickly. It barely put up a fight.

event.name: AB1 Followup Message
event.incoming_comms_text: Um, it's going to leave the sector after this last base, right?

event.name: AB2 Destroyed
event.incoming_comms_text: That did it! We've cleared out the Hegemony presence on this border with the help of our strange friend. Well done, Artemis! You know what they say, "the enemy of my enemy is my friend".

event.name: AB2 Followup Message
event.incoming_comms_text: I've made a huge mistake. It's not just going after the Hegemony, it's coming after us as well! Save us, Artemis!

set_ship_text.name: ScanPointA
set_ship_text.desc: There's a strange energy signature here, unlike anything we've seen before.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: No further information is available here.

set_ship_text.name: ScanPointA
set_ship_text.desc: There's a strange energy signature here, unlike anything we've seen before. There are gravitational waves emanating from this point.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: No further information is available here.

set_ship_text.name: ScanPointA
set_ship_text.desc: There's a strange energy signature here, unlike anything we've seen before. There are gravitational waves emanating from this point. It resembles black hole decay bosons, but there's no black hole here.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: We'll need to fly through the area to learn more.

warning_popup_message.message: The shields are interfering with our sampling. We'll need to lower them.
warning_popup_message.name: Artemis

set_ship_text.name: ScanPointA
set_ship_text.desc: There's a strange energy signature here, unlike anything we've seen before. There are gravitational waves emanating from this point. It resembles black hole decay bosons, but there's no black hole here. Space was somehow folded here using a high mass, low volume point.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: We'll need the shuttle to gather samples to get more detail.

event.name: Shuttle Collection

warning_popup_message.message: Shuttle sensors are gathering data. Continue to sweep the area.
warning_popup_message.name: Artemis

event.incoming_comms_text: Shuttle sensors are sampling the area and gathering data. Transferring data to Science.

warning_popup_message.message: Receiving data from the shuttle. Beginning analysis....
warning_popup_message.name: Artemis

event.name: Shuttle Analysis Complete

warning_popup_message.message: Data collection complete. Return to ship.
warning_popup_message.name: Artemis

event.incoming_comms_text: We've gathered all of the readings we can here. Transferring data to Science.

warning_popup_message.message: Receiving last of the data from the shuttle. Continuing analysis....
warning_popup_message.name: Artemis

event.name: Science Analysis Complete

warning_popup_message.message: It appears whatever created this phenomenon has harnessed the power of a black hole. That sounds dangerous.
warning_popup_message.name: Artemis

event.incoming_comms_text: It appears whatever created this phenomenon has harnessed the power of a black hole. That sounds dangerous. If we new more maybe we could use it to our advantage.

set_ship_text.name: ScanPointB
set_ship_text.desc: There's a strange energy signature here, unlike anything we've seen before.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: No further information is available here.

set_ship_text.name: ScanPointB
set_ship_text.desc: There's a strange energy signature here, unlike anything we've seen before. There are gravitational waves emanating from this point.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: No further information is available here.

set_ship_text.name: ScanPointB
set_ship_text.desc: There's a strange energy signature here amidst debris, unlike anything we've seen before. There are gravitational waves emanating from this point. There are signs of a gravito-magnetic field on the nearby wreckage.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: We'll need to fly through the area to learn more.

warning_popup_message.message: The shields are interfering with our sampling. We'll need to lower them.
warning_popup_message.name: Artemis

set_ship_text.name: ScanPointB
set_ship_text.desc: There's a strange energy signature here amidst debris, unlike anything we've seen before. There are gravitational waves emanating from this point. There are signs of a gravito-magnetic field on the nearby wreckage. A tremendous field passed through this area.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: We'll need the shuttle to gather samples to get more detail.

event.name: Shuttle Collection

warning_popup_message.message: Shuttle sensors are gathering data. Continue to sweep the area.
warning_popup_message.name: Artemis

event.incoming_comms_text: Shuttle sensors are sampling the area and gathering data. Transferring data to Science.

warning_popup_message.message: Receiving data from the shuttle. Beginning analysis....
warning_popup_message.name: Artemis

event.name: Shuttle Analysis Complete

warning_popup_message.message: Data collection complete. Return to ship.
warning_popup_message.name: Artemis

event.incoming_comms_text: We've gathered all of the readings we can here. Transferring data to Science.

warning_popup_message.message: Receiving last of the data from the shuttle. Continuing analysis....
warning_popup_message.name: Artemis

event.name: Science Analysis Complete

warning_popup_message.message: It appears that stabilized gravito-magnetic field was generated to contain a black hole. That's far beyond our engineering abilities.
warning_popup_message.name: Artemis

event.incoming_comms_text: It appears whatever created this phenomenon has harnessed the power of a black hole. That sounds dangerous. If we new more maybe we could use it to our advantage.

event.name: Crazy Idea 1

warning_popup_message.message: You have a crazy idea. If you can destabilize the gravito-magnetic field, the black hole could be unleashed.
warning_popup_message.name: Artemis

event.incoming_comms_text: I have a crazy idea. If you can destabilize the gravito-magnetic field, the black hole could be unleashed.

event.name: Crazy Idea 2

warning_popup_message.message: We'd need to hit it with a concentrated tachyon burst somehow. Our scanners broadcast tachyons, but not in a concentrated way.
warning_popup_message.name: Artemis

event.incoming_comms_text: We'd need to hit it with a concentrated tachyon burst somehow. Our scanners broadcast tachyons, but not in a concentrated way.

event.name: Crazy Idea 3

warning_popup_message.message: Our beams could be used to direct the tachyons if the scanner could be rerouted.
warning_popup_message.name: Artemis

event.incoming_comms_text: Our beams could be used to direct the tachyons if the scanner could be rerouted.

event.name: Crazy Idea 4

warning_popup_message.message: You could cross-route the scanner broadcast arrays with the beams to make a tachyon beam.
warning_popup_message.name: Artemis

event.incoming_comms_text: I could cross-route the scanner broadcast arrays with the beams to make a tachyon beam.

event.name: Crazy Idea 5

warning_popup_message.message: While a tachyon beam is normally harmless, this is just crazy enough to work. I'll send instructions to Comms.
warning_popup_message.name: Artemis

event.incoming_comms_text: While a tachyon beam is normally harmless, this is just crazy enough to work. I'll send instructions to Comms.

To cross-route the sensors to the beams we'll need to do several things.^1) Engineering: Take beams power down to zero^2) Engineering: Boost scanner power to 300%^3) Weapons: Target the main alien ship^4) Science: Scan the main alien ship repeatedly^5) Hope for the best

warning_popup_message.message: Initiating Tachyon Beam. I hope this works.
warning_popup_message.name: Artemis

warning_popup_message.message: The gravito-magnetic field is buckling! Just a little bit longer.
warning_popup_message.name: Artemis

warning_popup_message.message: We did it! We released the black hole. Retreat!
warning_popup_message.name: Artemis

set_ship_text.name: StationScanKB1
set_ship_text.desc: This Kralien station is equipped for battle.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: No further information is available here.

set_ship_text.name: StationScanKB1
set_ship_text.desc: This Kralien station is equipped for battle. Scans show it contains spare arms and materials to service many warships.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: No further information is available here.

set_ship_text.name: StationScanKB1
set_ship_text.desc: This Kralien station is equipped for battle. Scan show it contains spare arms and materials to service many warships. It is using encrypted communications with other Kralien assets in the area.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: We'll need to double scanner power to learn more.

event.name: Scan Power Boost 200

set_ship_text.name: StationScanKB1
set_ship_text.desc: This Kralien station is equipped for battle. Scan show it contains spare arms and materials to service many warships. It is using encrypted communications with other Kralien assets in the area. We have captured some of their communications, but it needs to be decrypted.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: We'll need to triple scanner power to learn more.

event.incoming_comms_text: Scanners have intercepted encrypted communications from Kralien operations. We'll need to decrypt them using the Hegemony Comms menu to use their channel.

set_ship_text.name: StationScanKB1
set_ship_text.desc: This Kralien station is equipped for battle. Scan show it contains spare arms and materials to service many warships. It is using encrypted communications with other Kralien assets in the area. We have captured some of their communications, but it needs to be decrypted. This station commander is known to be brave to a fault.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: No further information can be gathered here.

set_ship_text.name: StationScanKB2
set_ship_text.desc: This Kralien station has several long-range scanners.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: No further information is available here.

set_ship_text.name: StationScanKB2
set_ship_text.desc: This Kralien station has several long-range scanners. It appears to be a listening post.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: No further information is available here.

set_ship_text.name: StationScanKB2
set_ship_text.desc: This Kralien station has several long-range scanners. It appears to be a listening post. It's sensors are focused on DS1 Rampart and it is send encrypted communications with nearby Kralien assets.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: We'll need to double scanner power to learn more.

event.name: Scan Power Boost 200

set_ship_text.name: StationScanKB2
set_ship_text.desc: This Kralien station has several long-range scanners. It appears to be a listening post. It's sensors are focused on DS1 Rampart. We have captured some of their communications, but it needs to be decrypted.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: We'll need to triple scanner power to learn more.

event.incoming_comms_text: Scanners have intercepted encrypted communications from Kralien operations. We'll need to decrypt them using the Hegemony Comms menu to use their channel.

set_ship_text.name: StationScanKB2
set_ship_text.desc: This Kralien station has several long-range scanners. It appears to be a listening post. It's sensors are focused on DS1 Rampart. We have captured some of their communications, but it needs to be decrypted. This station commander is known to be a religious fanatic.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: No further information can be gathered here.

set_ship_text.name: StationScanTB1
set_ship_text.desc: This Torgoth station has extensive sensors.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: No further information is available here.

set_ship_text.name: StationScanTB1
set_ship_text.desc: This Torgoth station has extensive sensors. Onboard you detect sophisticated recording equipment.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: No further information is available here.

set_ship_text.name: StationScanTB1
set_ship_text.desc: This Torgoth station has extensive sensors. Onboard you detect sophisticated recording equipment. There is also long-range broadcast equipment. It is using encrypted communications with other Torgoth assets in the area.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: We'll need to double scanner power to learn more.

event.name: Scan Power Boost 200

set_ship_text.name: StationScanTB1
set_ship_text.desc: This Torgoth station has extensive sensors. Onboard you detect sophisticated recording equipment. There is also long-range broadcast equipment. It is using encrypted communications with other Torgoth assets in the area. We have captured some of their communications, but it needs to be decrypted.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: We'll need to triple scanner power to learn more.

event.incoming_comms_text: Scanners have intercepted encrypted communications from Torgoth operations. We'll need to decrypt them using the Hegemony Comms menu to use their channel.

set_ship_text.name: StationScanTB1
set_ship_text.desc: This Torgoth station has extensive sensors. Onboard you detect sophisticated recording equipment. There is also long-range broadcast equipment. It is using encrypted communications with other Torgoth assets in the area. We have captured some of their communications, but it needs to be decrypted. The commander is a famous trideo personality in Torgoth war infotainment.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: No further information can be gathered here.

set_ship_text.name: StationScanSB1
set_ship_text.desc: This Skaraan station has numerous small towing craft in it.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: No further information is available here.

set_ship_text.name: StationScanSB1
set_ship_text.desc: This Skaraan station has numerous small towing craft in it. Scans show it contains spare parts to service many warships.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: No further information is available here.

set_ship_text.name: StationScanSB1
set_ship_text.desc: This Skaraan station has numerous small towing craft in it. Scans show it contains spare parts to service many warships. It is using encrypted communications with other Skaraan assets in the area.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: We'll need to double scanner power to learn more.

event.name: Scan Power Boost 200

set_ship_text.name: StationScanSB1
set_ship_text.desc: This Skaraan station has numerous small towing craft in it. Scans show it contains spare parts to service many warships. It is using encrypted communications with other Skaraan assets in the area. We have captured some of their communications, but it needs to be decrypted.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: We'll need to triple scanner power to learn more.

event.incoming_comms_text: Scanners have intercepted encrypted communications from Skaraan operations. We'll need to decrypt them using the Hegemony Comms menu to use their channel.

set_ship_text.name: StationScanSB1
set_ship_text.desc: This Skaraan station has numerous small towing craft in it. Scans show it contains spare parts to service many warships. It is using encrypted communications with other Skaraan assets in the area. We have captured some of their communications, but it needs to be decrypted. The Skaraan commander is a famous salvage dealer, known for selling Kralien salvaged parts back to the Kraliens.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: No further information can be gathered here.

set_ship_text.name: StationScanAB1
set_ship_text.desc: This Arvonian station has extensive sensors.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: No further information is available here.

set_ship_text.name: StationScanAB1
set_ship_text.desc: This Arvonian station has extensive sensors. What were initially scanned as fighters are actually unarmed research skiffs.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: No further information is available here.

set_ship_text.name: StationScanAB1
set_ship_text.desc: This Arvonian station has extensive sensors. What were initially scanned as fighters are actually unarmed research skiffs. It is using encrypted communications with nearby Arvonian assets.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: We'll need to double scanner power to learn more.

event.name: Scan Power Boost 200

set_ship_text.name: StationScanAB1
set_ship_text.desc: This Arvonian station has extensive sensors. What were initially scanned as fighters are actually unarmed research skiffs. It is using encrypted communications with nearby Arvonian assets. We have captured some of their communications, but it needs to be decrypted.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: We'll need to triple scanner power to learn more.

event.incoming_comms_text: Scanners have intercepted encrypted communications from Arvonian operations. We'll need to decrypt them using the Hegemony Comms menu to use their channel.

set_ship_text.name: StationScanAB1
set_ship_text.desc: This Arvonian station has extensive sensors. What were initially scanned as fighters are actually unarmed research skiffs. It is not armed, but is using encrypted communications with nearby Arvonian assets. It turns out what we thought was a base beam is actually a whale feeder. This base is completely unarmed. This station commander is a famous scientist and noted whale expert.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: No further information can be gathered here.

set_ship_text.name: StationScanAB2
set_ship_text.desc: This Arvonian station contains extensive crew quarters.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: No further information is available here.

set_ship_text.name: StationScanAB2
set_ship_text.desc: This Arvonian station contains extensive crew quarters. The crew quarters aren't currently full.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: No further information is available here.

set_ship_text.name: StationScanAB2
set_ship_text.desc: This Arvonian station contains extensive crew quarters. The crew quarters aren't currently full. It is using encrypted communications with other Arvonian assets in the area.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: We'll need to double scanner power to learn more.

event.name: Scan Power Boost 200

set_ship_text.name: StationScanAB2
set_ship_text.desc: This Arvonian station contains extensive crew quarters. The crew quarters aren't currently full. It is using encrypted communications with other Arvonian assets in the area. We have captured some of their communications, but it needs to be decrypted.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: We'll need to triple scanner power to learn more.

event.incoming_comms_text: Scanners have intercepted encrypted communications from Arvonian operations. We'll need to decrypt them using the Hegemony Comms menu to use their channel.

set_ship_text.name: StationScanAB2
set_ship_text.desc: This Arvonian station contains extensive crew quarters. The crew quarters aren't currently full. It is using encrypted communications with other Arvonian assets in the area. We have captured some of their communications, but it needs to be decrypted. The station commander is a famous flight instructor in the Royal Navy.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: No further information can be gathered here.

event.name: HegComms-Kralien-decrypt-start
event.incoming_comms_text: Decrypting communication protocols for Kralien operations. Compiling.... (we can only decrypt one protocol at a time, cancel to free up resources)

event.name: HegComms-Kralien-decrypt-cancel
event.incoming_comms_text: Canceling decryption routine. You may now decrypt a new protocol.

event.name: HegComms-Kralien-decrypt-end
event.incoming_comms_text: Communication protocols for Kraliens have been successfully decrypted. We can now communicate with them using internal protocols so that we don't get cut off.

event.name: HegComms-Kralien-hail
event.incoming_comms_text: Bah, stopping cluttering our communications with your endless blathering, human. End transmission!

event.name: HegComms-Kralien-hail-listen
event.incoming_comms_text: We don't have time for you, soft-skin, we're in the fight of our lives versus this strange alien!

event.name: HegComms-Kralien-taunt
event.incoming_comms_text: Itching for war, puny human? If it's war you want, it's war you'll get! Captains, teach this human to stay quiet!

event.name: HegComms-Kralien-taunt-listen
event.incoming_comms_text: Laughing at our misfortune? That is low, even for a mud-crawler like you. You'll get yours!

event.name: HegComms-Kralien-help
event.incoming_comms_text: Hah! You make me laugh. Hah! We do not need help from fur-heads like you.

event.name: HegComms-Kralien-help-listen
event.incoming_comms_text: We would rather meet fiery death in the void of space than help you! Now bring forth the Holy Scroll of Amborax and launch for glory!

event.name: HegComms-Torgoth-decrypt-start
event.incoming_comms_text: Decrypting communication protocols for Torgoth operations. Compiling.... (we can only decrypt one protocol at a time, cancel to free up resources)

event.name: HegComms-Torgoth-decrypt-cancel
event.incoming_comms_text: Canceling decryption routine. You may now decrypt a new protocol.

event.name: HegComms-Torgoth-decrypt-end
event.incoming_comms_text: Communication protocols for Torgoth have been successfully decrypted. We can now communicate with them using internal protocols so that we don't get cut off.

event.name: HegComms-Torgoth-hail
event.incoming_comms_text: Ho hum, hatchling. We cannot be bothered with your screeching.

event.name: HegComms-Torgoth-hail-listen
event.incoming_comms_text: These are strange days, short-nose. We have not seen a new alien race in some time.

event.name: HegComms-Torgoth-taunt
event.incoming_comms_text: Excellent. Your warmongering pleases us and our home viewing audience. Please continue your incendiary remarks while we teach you a lesson.

event.name: HegComms-Torgoth-taunt-listen
event.incoming_comms_text: Bah, you do not understand the gravity of this situation. You could be next on this alien's plate!

event.name: HegComms-Torgoth-help
event.incoming_comms_text: Why would we need the help of small folk like yourselves. We tower above all.

event.name: HegComms-Torgoth-help-listen
event.incoming_comms_text: This new alien threat is bad for ratings. Let us band together to be rid of it.
We will follow your lead on this threat. But double-cross us and you will learn how long-lived our vengence can be.

event.name: HegComms-Skaraan-decrypt-start
event.incoming_comms_text: Decrypting communication protocols for Skaraan operations. Compiling.... (we can only decrypt one protocol at a time, cancel to free up resources)

event.name: HegComms-Skaraan-decrypt-cancel
event.incoming_comms_text: Canceling decryption routine. You may now decrypt a new protocol.

event.name: HegComms-Skaraan-decrypt-end
event.incoming_comms_text: Communication protocols for Skaraans have been successfully decrypted. We can now communicate with them using internal protocols so that we don't get cut off.

event.name: HegComms-Skaraan-hail
event.incoming_comms_text: This is Skaraan War Corporate Innovation, how may I help... ...oh, it's you. You are not an approved customer.

event.name: HegComms-Skaraan-hail-listen
event.incoming_comms_text: Well, two-legs, we would love to get our tails on that new tech on the alien ship, as I'm sure you would as well. Perhaps a deal can be made?

event.name: HegComms-Skaraan-taunt
event.incoming_comms_text: Really? You, threaten us? Your backwards technology is no match for Skaraan innovation.

event.name: HegComms-Skaraan-taunt-listen
event.incoming_comms_text: Why you little tailless... ...oh, I see what you're doing. You want us to ignore the alien ship so you can get the salvage. I think not.

event.name: HegComms-Skaraan-help
event.incoming_comms_text: While we would like to do business with you, our current contracts with the Kraliens prevent us from engaging.

event.name: HegComms-Skaraan-help-listen
event.incoming_comms_text: Contracts be trampled! If we do not work merge our efforts against this threat there will be no profit for either of us!
Our ship will work with you now. We are watching to see if you can be trusted in future endeavors.

event.name: HegComms-Arvonian-decrypt-start
event.incoming_comms_text: Decrypting communication protocols for Arvonian operations. Compiling.... (we can only decrypt one protocol at a time, cancel to free up resources)

event.name: HegComms-Arvonian-decrypt-cancel
event.incoming_comms_text: Canceling decryption routine. You may now decrypt a new protocol.

event.name: HegComms-Arvonian-decrypt-end
event.incoming_comms_text: Communication protocols for Arvonians have been successfully decrypted. We can now communicate with them using internal protocols so that we don't get cut off.

event.name: HegComms-Arvonian-hail
event.incoming_comms_text: Greetings humans. We hope you are treating your computers well today. We are currently busy with our research in this area.

event.name: HegComms-Arvonian-hail-listen
event.incoming_comms_text: My my, this new alien is most strange. And violent. Please understand that our station AB1 is a civilian research station and should not be involved in armed conflict.

event.name: HegComms-Arvonian-taunt
event.incoming_comms_text: What curious remarks. I see you are trying to provoke a reaction, but we cannot leave our science station unguarded. Perhaps another time.

event.name: HegComms-Arvonian-taunt-listen
event.incoming_comms_text: Really, hairy ones? We are fighting a sinister new threat and you chatter from the sides? Are there not better things you could be doing with your time?

event.name: HegComms-Arvonian-help
event.incoming_comms_text: We are interested in exchanging research on space whales, but our scientific translator is not due here for another week. Perhaps then?

event.name: HegComms-Arvonian-help-listen
event.incoming_comms_text: This new alien has the ability to destroy us all. Yes, let's band together to save our computers and the whales in the region from this menace.
Our ships are standing by to coordinate with you. We must protect station AB1, for they are a defenseless civilian station with advanced research computers.

event.name: Ending-Martyr
event.incoming_comms_text: Mission Accomplished: Martyr Ending. You followed a crazy idea to defeat the alien while making the ultimate sacrifice! Mission was completed in |CountUpMins| minutes.

big_message.title: Mission Accomplished: Martyr Ending
big_message.subtitle1: You followed a crazy idea to defeat the alien while making the ultimate sacrifice!
big_message.subtitle2: You completed the mission in |CountUpMins| minutes.

log.text: Mission Accomplished: Martyr Ending. Mission was completed in |CountUpMins| minutes.
